name: SpaceMyShooter
description:
After a bunch of prototypes and unfinished games I've actually finished something!!!

This is just a reeeeally simple game. Just made it to say that at least I could build and deliver something.

Probably I won't fix any possible bugs or improve anything. But leave it a feedback and tell me if you liked.

xoxo.

Music made by - Beowulf Bitter

Assets by - DinV Studio
